name: Cillian the Lucky
aura: Increases Ally ATK in All Battles by 25%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 35% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Each hit also has a 35% chance of stealing 30% of the target's current Turn Meter.
skills.name: Trip Up
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 85% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 4 turns. Also has a 35% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff on all other enemies for 1 turn.
skills.name: Inflict Misfortune
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 25% chance of placing the [Stun] debuff for 2 turns instead and stealing 50% of the target's current Turn Meter. Resets the cooldown of this Skill if the target is killed.
skills.name: Head Ringer
skills.books:
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 4: Damage +20%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Places one of the following buffs on this Champion for 2 turns at the start of each turn: a 50% [Increase ATK] buff, a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff, a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff, a 25% [Strengthen] buff, or a [Block Damage] buff.
skills.name: Charmed Life [P]
